name: The Start of Something Amazing.
description:
Rosie and Emily are best friends, they know each other for years, and today they'll have a sleepover at Emily's place but...
Why is Rosie having this weird feelings when she's with Emily? And, why is Emily teasing her so much?
But one thing is for sure. This will be the start of something amazing.
A visual novel made by SakuraLily works(Story) and TangledVirus(Art, UI, Codding.) for Yuri Game Jam 2019!

Find us at!
